select sb.board_category from (select count(*), board_id from sac_post group by board_id order by count(*) desc) sj left join sac_board sb on sj.board_id = sb.board_id
where rownum <=5

select su.user_name, su.user_image from (select count(*), user_id from sac_post group by user_id order by count(*) desc) sp left join sac_users su on sp.user_id = su.user_id
where rownum <=5
